fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.density

Class SimpleMKLDensity<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.density.SimpleMKLDensity<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DensityFunction<T>, java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleMKLDensity<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DensityFunction<T>
    Density estimation using an adapted version of SimpleMKL.

    In case C=1, it might be equivalent to a Parzen estimator, albeight performing kernel selection

    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
